questions.text: Your team completed 20 story points in Sprint 1 and 25 in Sprint 2. What is the average velocity?
A task started on Monday (Day 1) and finished on Thursday (Day 4). What’s the cycle time (in days)?
Your codebase has 100 unresolved issues. 40 are critical. What’s the tech debt ratio (critical issues/total)?
Your burn-down chart shows 50 story points on Day 1 and 30 on Day 2. What’s the daily burn-down rate?
If 5 out of 50 tasks are blocked, what’s the block rate percentage?
Your team resolved 8 bugs this sprint, but 2 escaped to production. What’s the escaped defect ratio?
